description:
For over a decade the Cochise franchise has continuously raised the bar in the hybrid ski boot category. The Cochise Pro W DYN is a stiff 4-buckle alpine boot combined with the versatility and walkability of a touring boot. The C.A.S. shell and liner provide out-of-the-box comfort with thermo-shaping capabilities for those whose feet just need a little more work. The anatomical C.A.S. liner with a flexible achilles area for touring optimizes your time on the hill.

  • Polyurethane shell and polypropylene cuff, makes for a stiff and lightweight boot
  • T-Ride system delivers the perfect combination between downhill performance and uphill hiking ability
  • C.A.S. liners are anatomically shaped for optimal comfort and offer great heel hold
  • Range of motion in walk mode is 50 degrees
  • 45mm Power Lock strap allows for quick and easy transitions
  • 4 lightweight alloy buckles that catch when loosened for walk mode
  • Forward lean adjustment of 12.5 degrees
  • Compatible with tech and GripWalk bindings
name: Tecnica Cochise Pro W DYN Ski Boots - Women's
